gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `SubtotalLiabilitiesNoncurrent` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `LiabilitiesNoncurrent` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartXMutationPeriodEndY1_SubtotalLiabilitiesNoncurrentEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartXMutationPeriodEndY1_SubtotalLiabilitiesNoncurrentEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartXMutationPeriodEndY1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartXMutationPeriodEndY1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartXMutationPeriodEndY1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartXMutationPeriodEndY1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesNoncurrentMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesNoncurrentMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesNoncurrentMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesNoncurrentMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrent` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan + `SubtotalLiabilitiesNoncurrent` - `LiabilitiesNoncurrentTransferToLiabilitiesCurrent`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_LiabilitiesNoncurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_LiabilitiesNoncurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_SubtotalLiabilitiesNoncurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_SubtotalLiabilitiesNoncurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentTransferToLiabilitiesCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentTransferToLiabilitiesCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrent` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan + `SubtotalLiabilitiesNoncurrent` - `LiabilitiesNoncurrentTransferToLiabilitiesCurrent`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_LiabilitiesNoncurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_LiabilitiesNoncurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_SubtotalLiabilitiesNoncurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_SubtotalLiabilitiesNoncurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_LiabilitiesNoncurrentTransferToLiabilitiesCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesPayablesOtherNoncurrentMovementSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_LiabilitiesNoncurrentTransferToLiabilitiesCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
